Setting Report Options

Set report options to select how Serena ChangeMan Version Manager displays the output of generated reports (history, journal, security reports). You can select one of the following applications to view reports:

  • HTML Browser - This option enables you to customize the output of your reports, such as applying a template or adding a company logo, and publish the reports on a web site. However, if you generate a report for more than 400 files, the browser will take a minute or two to display the data.
  • Text Editor - This option enables you to view generated reports very quickly, but your ability to format the information is limited.

To set report options on Windows platforms:

  1. Select View | Options. The Options dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  2. Click the Applications tab.

  3. In the Report Viewer group, select either Use text editor or Use default HTML browser.

To set report options on UNIX platforms:

  1. Select View | Options. The Options dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  2. Click the Applications tab. In the Report Viewer group, select either Use text editor or Use default HTML browser.

  3. If you selected to use a text editor, specify the location of the browser in the Editor Location field (above) or click the Browse button to select it. If you selected to use the default HTML browser, specify the location of the browser in the Browser Location field or click the Browse button to select the location.
